document_data.name: Thirsty
document_data.mainbody: '''Thirsty''' was [[Marlin Stormserpent]]'s pet [[stirge]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Unlike other stirges, Thirsty liked to sample blood from many different people, instead of draining one target to death.{{cite book/Elminster Must Die/MMP|305-307|29}}
document_data.Abilities: Marlin Stormserpent often painted Thirsty's beak with a paralyzing [[poison]]. He had also trained the stirge well enough to know it was to go for a selected target first.
document_data.Relationships: Thirsty was of course Marlin's pet. Unknown to him, the evil [[archmage]] [[Manshoon]] sometimes took direct mental control of the stirge. It didn't like [[blueflame ghost]]s.
